title: Ep126: Waterloo - Field Marshal von Blücher
itunes:title: Ep126: Waterloo - Field Marshal von Blücher
description:
Pete and Gary return to the popular topic of Waterloo to discuss Prussian Field Marshal Gebhard Leberecht von Blücher.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki
